title: Unlocked pixel 4a 5g and Verizon
content: I don't care about 5G because its not available where I live in AZ. I am with Verizon. Can I buy a pixel 4a 5g, and use it with verizon, instead of buying verizon's version which is 4a 5g UW. Verizon charges $100 more . I only want this model because of it's larger screen.
